title: Little Love on the Prairie
description: Selene Hawes is no stranger to running away. She ran away from Black Creek four years ago, and now she runs back to it.Clint Porter spent four years trying to forget her. When she shows up out of the blue, it feels too good to be true.Secrets, revelations, and unexpected danger can make or break their relationship. Can he believe she's back to stay? Can she trust him with her heart?Can life on the prairie heal all open wounds and make true love blossom?
author: E.M. Denning
